All Implemented Interfaces:
Model, ScenarioLink
Direct Known Subclasses:
RandomWaypoint, RPGM
public abstract class RandomSpeedBase
extends Scenario

Base class for those models that needs three parameters minimum speed, maximum speed maximum pause time.
